news.title: International Cooperation
news.text: We are pleased to announce the arrival of new computer equipment that will help improve the quality of education and research work.

news.title: Launch of New Online Platform
news.text: A new online platform for distance learning with video conferencing integration has been launched.

news.title: International IT Conference
news.text: The university will host an international IT conference with leading industry experts invited.

news.title: Programming Courses Enrollment
news.text: Student enrollment is announced for free Python programming courses.

news.title: Cybersecurity Webinar
news.text: We invite you to a free webinar on cybersecurity basics and data protection.

news.title: Laboratory Modernization
news.text: As part of the 'Innovative Education' project, physics and chemistry laboratories are being modernized.

news.title: Student Library Opening
news.text: A new student library with an updated literature collection was officially opened today.

news.title: Robotics Science Club Meeting
news.text: A robotics science club meeting is being held, all interested students are invited.

news.title: Student Startup Competition
news.text: A startup competition is announced: authors of the best projects will receive financial support.

news.title: University Sports Competition
news.text: The university is hosting annual sports competitions in volleyball and football.

news.title: New Internship Partner
news.text: A memorandum of cooperation has been signed with a world company for student internships.

news.title: Lecture from Polish Professor
news.text: A professor from Wroclaw University will be a guest of the university and give an open lecture.

news.title: Time Management Training
news.text: Free time management and personal effectiveness training has been organized for students.

news.title: Environmental Campus Action
news.text: We invite you to join the university territory cleanup as part of an environmental campaign.

news.title: Photo Exhibition Opening
news.text: A student photography exhibition on the theme 'Our University' has been set up in the main building lobby.

news.title: Online Data Science Courses
news.text: Students will be able to take free online Data Science courses from leading world universities.

news.title: Student Exchange with Germany
news.text: A student exchange program with Berlin Technical University has been launched for a semester.

news.title: Open Mic for Students
news.text: We invite all talented students to perform with their musical and poetic works.

news.title: New Equipment in Library
news.text: Modern workstations with electronic readers and high-speed internet have been installed in the library.

news.title: Scientific Research Seminar
news.text: Leading scientists will conduct a seminar on modern research methods and technologies.

news.title: University Career Fair
news.text: Representatives of leading companies will present career opportunities for graduates.

news.title: Current Trends in Web Development
news.text: Lecture by leading developers on modern technologies and web development tools.

news.title: Student Environmental Debates
news.text: Student teams from different faculties will participate in debates on climate change.

news.title: Sports Ground Update
news.text: A new athletics ground with running tracks has been opened on the university territory.

news.title: Robotics Master Class
news.text: We invite students to a master class on robot design and programming.

news.title: Scholarship Award Ceremony
news.text: The best students will receive scholarships for academic and scientific achievements.

news.title: Student Cafe Opening
news.text: A new cafe with student-friendly prices has been opened in the first floor lobby.

news.title: International Student Conference
news.text: Students from partner universities will present their research projects.

news.title: Digital Skills Workshop
news.text: A workshop on digital literacy and modern information technologies will be held.

news.title: University Innovation Day
news.text: Students and teachers will present innovative projects and developments.

news.title: Cultural Exchange Evening
news.text: An evening of cultural exchange with students from different countries will be held.

news.title: Scientific Article Competition
news.text: A competition for the best scientific articles among students has been announced.

news.title: University Theater Performance
news.text: The student theater will present a new performance based on classical literature.

news.title: Modern Technologies Exhibition
news.text: An exhibition of modern technologies and innovations will be held at the university.

news.title: Student Leadership Forum
news.text: A forum for student leaders and activists will be held to discuss university development.

news.title: University Research Day
news.text: Students will present their research projects and scientific achievements.

news.title: International Cooperation Agreement
news.text: A cooperation agreement has been signed with a leading European university.

news.title: Student Innovation Hub
news.text: A new innovation hub for student projects and startups has been opened.

news.title: University Science Festival
news.text: A science festival with interactive exhibits and experiments will be held.

news.title: Student Entrepreneurship Program
news.text: A program to support student entrepreneurship and business projects has been launched.

news.title: University Technology Transfer
news.text: A technology transfer center has been established to commercialize university developments.

news.title: Student Research Grant
news.text: Grants for student research projects in priority areas have been announced.

news.title: University Innovation Center
news.text: An innovation center for developing and implementing student ideas has been opened.

news.title: International Student Olympiad
news.text: The university will host an international student olympiad in technical disciplines.

news.title: University Research Laboratory
news.text: A new research laboratory with modern equipment has been opened for students.

news.title: Student Scientific Conference
news.text: A student scientific conference with international participation will be held.

news.title: Scientific Work Competition
news.text: A competition for the best student scientific works with awards and journal publication has been announced.

news.title: Thematic Movie Evening
news.text: The student film club will show a selection of Ukrainian films with discussion after viewing.

news.title: Volunteer Project at Orphanage
news.text: Students and teachers joined a charity campaign and visited a local orphanage.

news.title: Psychological Health Seminar
news.text: University psychologists will conduct a seminar on stress management and relaxation during exams.

news.title: Chess Club Meeting
news.text: Chess club meetings for beginners and experienced players are held every Thursday at 17:00.
